definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: Three patients were died among which 2 were died of mycotic septicemia and 1 cardiac failure.
sentences.chinese: 合并霉菌性败血症2例，合并心功能衰竭1例。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the clinical characteristics and preventive measures of hospital-acquired septicemia in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索医院感染败血症的特点和预防措施。

sentences.english: All patients were dead of severe sepsis and multiple system organ failure.
sentences.chinese: 所有病例均死于严重败血症及多脏器功能衰竭。

sentences.english: Put some anti-septic cream on it.
sentences.chinese: 涂上一些防止败血症的药膏。

sentences.english: The serious acute pelvic inflammatory disease may cause the septicaemia to endanger life.
sentences.chinese: 严重的急性盆腔炎可引起败血症危及生命。

sentences.english: However, there were more episodes of superinfection , including new sepsis and septic shock.
sentences.chinese: 两组都没有出现二重感染，包括败血症和脓毒性休克。

sentences.english: Do leukaemia and septicemia have why to differ?
sentences.chinese: 白血病和败血症有何不同？

sentences.english: May have the pus poisonous septicaemia really.
sentences.chinese: 甚者可发生脓毒败血症。

sentences.english: Infection by many kinds of bacteria may cause bacteremia.
sentences.chinese: 可导致败血症的细菌种类很多。

sentences.english: Pneumococcal disease causes pneumonia, meningitis and sepsis.
sentences.chinese: 肺炎球菌会引发肺炎，脑膜炎和败血症。

sentences.english: Is Severe Sepsis Associated With New-Onset Atrial Fibrillation and Stroke?
sentences.chinese: 严重败血症是否与新发房颤和卒中相关？

sentences.english: Are leukaemia and septicemia one and the same?
sentences.chinese: 白血病与败血症是一回事吗？

sentences.english: Although a partial penectomy and concurrent antibiotics were provided, the patient died due to sepsis and DM complications.
sentences.chinese: 患者最后因败血症及多重糖尿病病变而不治。

sentences.english: Sepsis – a very severe infection – is the second most frequent cause of maternal death.
sentences.chinese: 败血症是第二大常见的孕产妇死亡原因。

sentences.english: What do leukaemia and septicemia have to differ?
sentences.chinese: 白血病和败血症有什么不同？

sentences.english: During treatment necrotizing fasciitis of his right legs arised, and at last he died of septicemia.
sentences.chinese: 治疗过程中出现右下肢坏死性筋膜炎，后死于败血症。
